short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the power of Hej Sales Email to Gmail. Select Follow up Sequences, turn on Email Tracking and Bcc Emails to CRM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* See in your Gmail if emails have need opened
* Turn on/turn off tracking for each email
* Bcc emails to CRM
* Schedule a follow up email series

Check out all features now as long as you like!
